verses.verse: And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H3659>Coniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> made <S%H4427>king<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

But <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1931>he,<s%> nor his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> nor the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> did <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah.<s%>

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3081>Jehucal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%> and <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6419>Pray<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> us.

Now <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> for they had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> him into <S%H1004>prison.<s%> <S%H3628><s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> was come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt:<s%> <S%H4714><s%> and when the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8088>tidings<s%> of them, they <S%H5927>departed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
Then <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> that <S%H7971>sent<s%> you <S%H413>unto<s%> me to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of me; <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H2428>army,<s%> which is come <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> you, shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into their own <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> shall come <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3920>take<s%> it, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H5377>Deceive<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> shall surely <S%H1980>depart<s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> us: <S%H3588>for<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>depart.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>though<s%> ye had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> you, and there <S%H7604>remained<s%> but <S%H1856>wounded<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> among them, yet should they <S%H6965>rise<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that when the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> was broken <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H4480>fear<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H2428>army,<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3389><s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> to separate <S%H2505>himself<s%> <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And when <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> a <S%H1167>captain<s%> of the <S%H6488>ward<s%> was <S%H8033>there,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3376>Irijah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2608>Hananiah;<s%> and he <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> fallest <S%H5307>away<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> It is <S%H8267>false;<s%> I <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> away <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%> But he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him: so <S%H3376>Irijah<s%> <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H8269>princes.<s%>

Wherefore the <S%H8269>princes<s%> were <S%H7107>wroth<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and <S%H5414>put<s%> him in <S%H1004>prison<s%> <S%H612><s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they had <S%H6213>made<s%> that the <S%H1004>prison.<s%> <S%H3608><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> was <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1004>dungeon,<s%> <S%H953><s%> and <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2588>cabins,<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> had <S%H3427>remained<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%>

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> him out: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> him <S%H5643>secretly<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Is <S%H3426>there<s%> any <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> There <S%H3426>is:<s%> for, <S%H559>said<s%> he, thou shalt be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have I <S%H2398>offended<s%> against thee, or against thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> or against <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> ye have <S%H5414>put<s%> me <S%H413>in<s%> <S%H1004>prison?<s%> <S%H3608><s%>

Where <S%H346><s%> are now your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> unto you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, nor <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land?<s%>

Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> O my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king:<s%> let my <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> be <S%H5307>accepted<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; that thou cause me <S%H408>not<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> I <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> that they should <S%H6485>commit<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> into the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison,<s%> and that they should <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H3117>daily<s%> a <S%H3603>piece<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> out of the <S%H644>bakers'<s%> <S%H4480>street,<s%> <S%H2351><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H4480>in<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> were <S%H8552>spent.<s%> Thus <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison.<s%>
